messages.zh: 穿过现在这片区域，就快抵达斜向出口了。
messages.tl: Passing through the area now, you will soon arrive at the oblique exit.

messages.zh: 这个开阔区，曾经是个大广场吧。
messages.tl: This open area was once a big square.
Today... there are only a few ruins left.
- This distance, no way to confirm identity.
The Reunion Movement is attacking them -!

messages.zh: 侦查小组在这种地形没有优势。
messages.tl: The investigation team has no advantage in this terrain.
Direct use of the firepower team -

messages.zh: 哪怕是吸引注意力——也不行。
messages.tl: Even if it attracts attention - it doesn't work either.

messages.zh: 立刻沿建筑外围向广场出口移动。
messages.tl: Immediately move along the perimeter of the building to the exit of the square.

messages.zh: 没错，我是骑士。我为美德而战。
messages.tl: Yes, I am a knight. I am fighting for virtue.

messages.zh: 所以我必须提醒你一点。
messages.tl: So I must remind you a little.

messages.zh: 你的决策将影响整个救援队的命运。
messages.tl: Your decision will affect the fate of the entire rescue team.

messages.zh: 只要你下命令，我一定会履行。
messages.tl: As long as you order, I will definitely perform.

messages.zh: 所以我很庆幸你没把话说完。
messages.tl: So I am very glad that you have not finished talking.

messages.zh: 如果我没看错的话，已经来不及了。
messages.tl: If I am not mistaken, it is too late.

messages.zh: 开阔区各个出口同时出现大量整合运动！
messages.tl: A large number of Reunion Movements appear in each of the open areas!
————Cannot expose the back to the enemy!
